CustomField.description: This field categorizes inside sales companies depending on who owns them (AE, ADR, Pool).
CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(OR(BillingCountry='United States', BillingCountry='Canada', BillingCountry='Mexico'), OR(Number_of_Vehicles__c>20,Number_of_Powered_Assets__c>40, AND(Number_of_Students__c>2000,Number_of_Students__c<10000, NOT(ISBLANK(Number_of_Students__c))),AND(Number_of_Citizens__c>10000,Number_of_Citizens__c<100000, NOT(ISBLANK(Number_of_Citizens__c)))),OR(ISPICKVAL(Organization_Size__c,'1 - 99'), ISPICKVAL(Organization_Size__c,'100 - 499'), ISPICKVAL(Organization_Size__c,'500 - 999'))),
IF(Owner.LastName='Pool',
IF(Status__c='Delete','Pool - Not Loadable',
IF(OR((TODAY()-DATEVALUE(Last_Contacted__c)<60),(TODAY()-DATEVALUE(Account_Assignment_Date__c)<3)), "Pool - Cooling Down", "Pool - Ready to Load")),
IF(AND(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,'ADR OB'),ISPICKVAL(Owner.ADR_Segment_Alignment__c,'AE2')), 'IS ADR 2',
IF(AND(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,'ADR OB'),ISPICKVAL(Owner.ADR_Segment_Alignment__c,'AE3')), 'IS ADR 3',
IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,'AE1'),'IS AE 1',
IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,'AE2'),'IS AE 2',
IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,'AE3'),'IS AE 3',
IF(CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name,'ADR IB'), 'Inbound ADR',
IF(Owner.IsActive=False, 'Deactivated User',
'Owned by Other Role')))))))), 'Not AE2/AE3 Account')
CustomField.label: Inside Sales Account Ownership Bucket
